verses.text: Now after these things , in the reign of Artaxerxes king of Persia , Ezra the son of Seraiah , the son of Azariah , the son of Hilkiah ,
The son of Shallum , the son of Zadok , the son of Ahitub ,
The son of Amariah , the son of Azariah , the son of Meraioth ,
The son of Zerahiah , the son of Uzzi , the son of Bukki ,
The son of Abishua , the son of Phinehas , the son of Eleazar , the son of Aaron the chief priest :

This Ezra went up from Babylon ; and he \add was\add* a ready scribe in the law of Moses , which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of Israel had given : and the king granted him all his request , according to the hand of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* his God upon him.

And there went up \add some\add* of the children of Israel , and of the priests , and the Levites , and the singers , and the porters , and the Nethinims , unto Jerusalem , in the seventh year of Artaxerxes the king.
And he came to Jerusalem in the fifth month , which \add was\add* in the seventh year of the king.

For upon the first \add day\add* of the first month began he to go up from Babylon , and on the first \add day\add* of the fifth month came he to Jerusalem , according to the good hand of his God upon him.\f + \fr 7.9 \ft began…: Heb. was the foundation of the going up\f*
For Ezra had prepared his heart to seek the law of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and to do \add it\add*, and to teach in Israel statutes and judgments. \p

¶ Now this \add is\add* the copy of the letter that the king Artaxerxes gave unto Ezra the priest , the scribe , \add even\add* a scribe of the words of the commandments of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of his statutes to Israel.

Artaxerxes , king of kings , unto Ezra the priest , a scribe of the law of the God of heaven , perfect \add peace\add*, and at such a time.\f + \fr 7.12 \ft unto…: or, to Ezra the priest, a perfect scribe of the law of the God of heaven, peace, etc\f*
I make a decree , that all they of the people of Israel , and \add of\add* his priests and Levites , in my realm , which are minded of their own freewill to go up to Jerusalem , go with thee.

Forasmuch as thou art sent of the king , and of his seven counsellors , to enquire concerning Judah and Jerusalem , according to the law of thy God which \add is\add* in thine hand ;\f + \fr 7.14 \ft of the king: Chaldee, from before the king\f*
And to carry the silver and gold , which the king and his counsellors have freely offered unto the God of Israel , whose habitation \add is\add* in Jerusalem ,

And all the silver and gold that thou canst find in all the province of Babylon , with the freewill offering of the people , and of the priests , offering willingly for the house of their God which \add is\add* in Jerusalem :

That thou mayest buy speedily with this money bullocks , rams , lambs , with their meat offerings and their drink offerings , and offer them upon the altar of the house of your God which \add is\add* in Jerusalem.
And whatsoever shall seem good to thee, and to thy brethren , to do with the rest of the silver and the gold , that do after the will of your God.
The vessels also that are given thee for the service of the house of thy God , \add those\add* deliver thou before the God of Jerusalem.
And whatsoever more shall be needful for the house of thy God , which thou shalt have occasion to bestow , bestow \add it\add* out of the king’s treasure house.

And I , \add even\add* I Artaxerxes the king , do make a decree to all the treasurers which \add are\add* beyond the river , that whatsoever Ezra the priest , the scribe of the law of the God of heaven , shall require of you, it be done speedily ,

Unto an hundred talents of silver , and to an hundred measures of wheat , and to an hundred baths of wine , and to an hundred baths of oil , and salt without prescribing \add how much\add*.\f + \fr 7.22 \ft measures: Chaldee, cors\f*

Whatsoever is commanded by the God of heaven , let it be diligently done for the house of the God of heaven : for why should there be wrath against the realm of the king and his sons ?\f + \fr 7.23 \ft Whatsoever…: Chaldee, Whatsoever is of the decree\f*

Also we certify you, that touching any of the priests and Levites , singers , porters , Nethinims , or ministers of this house of God , it shall not be lawful to impose toll , tribute , or custom , upon them.

And thou , Ezra , after the wisdom of thy God , that \add is\add* in thine hand , set magistrates and judges , which may judge all the people that \add are\add* beyond the river , all such as know the laws of thy God ; and teach ye them that know \add them\add* not.

And whosoever will not do the law of thy God , and the law of the king , let judgment be executed speedily upon him , whether \add it be\add* unto death , or to banishment , or to confiscation of goods , or to imprisonment.\f + \fr 7.26 \ft to banishment: Chaldee, to rooting out\f* \p

¶ Blessed \add be\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of our fathers , which hath put \add such a thing\add* as this in the king’s heart , to beautify the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* which \add is\add* in Jerusalem :

And hath extended mercy unto me before the king , and his counsellors , and before all the king’s mighty princes. And I was strengthened as the hand of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my God \add was\add* upon me, and I gathered together out of Israel chief men to go up with me.
